tool_description: Retrieve the JWT token and the UserId to make call to the tracking api
title: Tracking login

api_list.name: /tracking/{userId}/aggiungiSpedizione
api_list.description: You can add a tracking number, and add it to the diary for the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tracking-login.p.rapidapi.com/tracking/{userid}/aggiungiSpedizione"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tracking-login.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Login

import requests

url = "https://tracking-login.p.rapidapi.com/login"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tracking-login.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /tracking/{userId}/recuperaDiario
api_list.description: Retrieve the user diary detail, with spedition status, and update

api_list.name: /tracking/{userId}/aggiungiSpedizione
api_list.description: You can add a tracking number, and add it to the diary for the user.
